title: Goroutine Leaks - The Abandoned Receivers
description:
Introduction Goroutine Leaks are a common cause of memory leaks in Go programs. In my previous post, I presented an introduction to Goroutine leaks and provided one example of a common mistake that many Go developers make. Continuing that work, this post presents another scenario on how Goroutines could be leaked.
Leak: The Abandoned Receivers For this leak example you will see multiple Goroutines blocked waiting to receive values that will never be sent.

title: Parrot: A Swift Mock Generator
description: Coding mock classes in Swift is a huge pain point of unit testing applications written in Swift. Parrot is a Swift script that generates the boiler-plate code for mocks in order to decrease the time it takes to write unit tests. It is not iOS specific, so it can be used for Swift server-side and for command-line tools too.

title: README.md to Manage Humans
description: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.
